item.title: World of Warcraft Midnight Release Date & Exact Start Times
item.content:encoded:
A major expansion is on the horizon for World of Warcraft players with the long-awaited release of Midnight, with the release date for WoW Midnight now right around the corner.

The release date for the expansion was first revealed back in November, meaning fans have been ticking down the hours waiting for the next big slew of content in the Blizzard masterpiece.

If you’re eagerly awaiting the WoW Midnight release date, Insider Gaming has all the important details.

When is WoW Midnight Coming Out? Release Date, Explained

World of War Midnight is set for release on Monday, February 2, so the countdown to launch is well and truly on.

Midnight brings the long-awaited arrival of housing to WoW, something players have been clamouring for, and it’s expected to be a busy release period. Naturally, that may come alongside server stress, so prepare yourself for potential problems.

  • More Insider Gaming: Does Slay The Spire 2 Early Access Have Multiplayer?

WoW has the capacity to deal with the majority of server stress issues, however, so there shouldn’t be too many major problems.

When is WoW Midnight Early Access?

Early access for World of Warcraft Midnight is set for Thursday, February 26, giving players an extra weekend to dive into all the brand-new content.

Like many other games, however, entry to early access comes at a cost, as it requires an additional purchase. Given the cost of maintaining WoW access, players may want to consider holding out for the full release.

What Are The WoW Midnight Start Times?

WoW Midnight is set to be released at 3 PM on March 2, with the early access launch coming four days earlier at the same time.

That means a late afternoon launch for those in the United States, while those in Europe face a late night. Meanwhile, those in Asia and Oceania have to wait until the next day.

The exact release times have been shared by Blizzard and are available in the table below. We’ve separated the main release time and early access into different columns.

What is the first thing you’re planning to do in World of Warcraft Midnight? Share your plans in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For your next read, check out Windrose surpassing one million Steam wishlists, and why the Saints Row director believes the franchise is dead.

item.title: Does Slay The Spire 2 Early Access Have Multiplayer? Co-Op & Multiplayer, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Slay The Spire 2 is ready to enter Early Access, just like its predecessor did all those years ago. It’s the perfect time to take on community feedback and balance the various cards and characters, but there’s one thing on everyone’s mind—will the sequel have multiplayer?

It was one of the most requested features for the original Slay The Spire, and for good reason; who wouldn’t want to ascend the Spire with their friends? Well, now’s the time to find out whether Mega Crit took on the fan feedback, and to see whether Slay The Spire 2 will have multiplayer during Early Access.

Does Slay The Spire 2 Early Access Have Multiplayer?

Yes, Slay The Spire 2 will have multiplayer during Early Access, as you and up to three friends can face the Spire together.

This is thanks to the brand new online Co-Op mode, which brings a whole new level of complexity to the game. From multiplayer exclusive cards to powerful team synergies, you and your friends can work together to ascend the Spire and beat the game.

  • More Insider Gaming: 8 Biggest Indie Games Coming In 2026

Of course, this is brand new to Slay The Spire 2, with the original game not having any form of multiplayer or co-op available. Whilst you can still play the game solo, there’s no denying that strategizing with three friends will be a thrill like no other—but can you do it from the same device?

Does Slay The Spire 2 Early Access Have Split-Screen Co-Op?

At the moment, it doesn’t seem like Slay The Spire 2 will have split-screen co-op during Early Access.

Mega Crit have only mentioned that the game will have online co-op, and there remains no mention as to whether there will be anything to do with split-screen. However, the likelihood is that whilst it remains in Early Access, co-op features will remain exclusively online.

  • More Insider Gaming: What Is Pokémon Pokopia?

That’s not to say that it won’t change in the future, though. As the game rolls out on different platforms once Early Access is complete, there’s a chance that local multiplayer features could be added. Until then, though, you’ll have to team up with your friends across different devices.

Will you be teaming up with anyone to take on the Spire? If you’re looking for someone to battle alongside, why not look for some friends in the official Insider Gaming Discord Server?

For more Insider Gaming content, check out the differences between Pokémon Fire Red and Leaf Green.

item.title: Today’s Strands #722 Hints and Answers for February 23, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Strands is a daily word search puzzle game from The New York Times. It is a relatively new game, launched in 2024, in which players seek a common theme among words in a 6×8 letter grid.

Whether it’s your first time playing or you’re a Strands veteran, today’s tips and strategies can help you find words faster. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Strands, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answers for Strands Game #722 for Monday, February 23, 2026

To play today’s Strands, head to the game’s website.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s edition of Strands. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Strands

Strands is a daily word search that challenges you to find words with a common theme. There’s also a Spanagram that reveals the deeper theme behind the words.

  • Words that are three letters and under do not count.
  • Words that reveal the correct theme appear in blue.
  • The Spanagram turns yellow when found.
  • Finding three words that don’t fit the theme will reveal a hint to help you find the proper words.

The goal is to string together as many words as possible. Every letter on the grid gets used! Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Strands can only be played on the New York Times website. You can also play on the NYT Games app.

Strands Hints For Today, February 23, 2026

The Strands’ answers for Game #722 are all related to a very specific musical instrument. Think Johnny Cash, Elvis Presley, and Jimi Hendrix. If you’re a wrestling fan, think Jeff Jarrett, the Honky Tonk Man, and Elias. Bear in mind that the answers are all generic things in relation to the instrument.

General Strands Hints For February 23

Without giving today’s Strands answers completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: The spanagram and overarching theme for today’s puzzle is an instrument that can produce quite emotional pieces of music. The Beatles even believed these instruments could weep.
  • Hint 2: Giraffes are known for these.
  • Hint 3: Some musicians need to be taken down a few of these.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Strands #722 for February 23, 2026.

Words to Help You Find Strand Hints for February 23, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Strands answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you unlock some in-game hints. A few starter words that may help are:

  • NOTE
  • ROAD
  • BOAR
  • STOCK
  • RIDGE

Today’s Strands Answer For Game #722 On February 23, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answers to today’s Strands below. Check out the answers for yesterday’s puzzle here.

  • PEGS
  • BRIDGE
  • STRING
  • FRETBOARD
  • HEADSTOCK
  • NECK
  • SPANAGRAM: GUITAR

If you solved today’s Strands without our answers, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

When Is The Next Strands Game After #722?

All New York Times games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before, giving players a heads-up. The game on February 24 will be Strands Game #723.

What Is Strands?

Strands is a daily word search puzzle game created by The New York Times. Launched in 2024, Strands challenges players to discover a common theme among words in a 6×8 letter grid. The game’s original concept was developed by Juliette Seive, a research director on The New York Times Games team, with the aim of replicating Wordle’s success. Tracy Bennett serves as the puzzle editor for Strands, overseeing the creation and curation of daily puzzles since its launch.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Slay The Spire 2 Early Access Release Date & Exact Start Times
item.content:encoded:
The sequel to the incredibly popular deck-building roguelike Slay The Spire was officially announced back in April, 2024, and now almost two years later, its release date has officially been announced.

However, that comes with a major caveat: Slay The Spire 2 is first releasing in Early Access, with an official full release date still unconfirmed. But if you’re eager to tackle the mysteries of the Spire, then you won’t have to wait long, as Early Access is right around the corner.

What Is The Slay The Spire 2 Early Access Release Date?

Mega Crit announced that Slay The Spire 2 will enter Early Access on March 5, 2026, though the full release date remains unknown.

Whilst it might sound confusing to some, the original Slay The Spire was actually released in the same way. It arrived in Early Access, and after almost two years’ worth of community-led finetuning and balancing, the game was officially released as the complete package.

  • More Insider Gaming: What Is Pokémon Pokopia?

Mega Crit mentioned on Slay The Spire 2’s Steam page that they expect to follow a similar schedule with the sequel. So, if all goes according to plan, Slay The Spire 2 should ideally officially launch as a complete package by late 2027 or early 2028. Of course, these dates are speculation, so don’t put too much trust in them, but fingers crossed that it arrives sooner rather than later.

Slay The Spire 2 Early Access Start Times

You’ll want to be up and ready in the morning, as Slay The Spire 2 will be launching in Early Access on Steam at 10 AM PT on March 5.

  • More Insider Gaming: 8 Biggest Indie Games Coming In 2026

Of course, not everyone diving into Slay The Spire 2’s Early Access will be native to the PT time zone, so for everybody else, Insider Gaming has adjusted the release time for your convenience. If you don’t see your time zone, let a staff member know, and it’ll be added!

Are you excited to try out the Slay The Spire 2 Early Access? Share your thoughts in the official Insider Gaming Discord Server.

For more Insider Gaming content, check out the Marathon release date and start times, as well as the Pokémon Pokopia release date and start times.

item.title: Wordscapes Daily Puzzle Hints Today—Answers For Monday, February 23
item.content:encoded:
Wordscapes is a popular word game where players solve a crossword using anagrams, and it also features a Daily Puzzle, which is not the easiest to solve at times.

If you are one of the players who is struggling with the latest Wordscapes Daily Puzzle, then don’t worry, as Insider Gaming has all the hints and answers for the puzzle featured on Monday, February 23.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s edition of the Wordscapes Daily Puzzle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How to Play Wordscapes

Wordscapes is a relatively easy game to play, but it can become increasingly challenging as you advance. In the game, players are presented with a crossword puzzle to solve using an anagram. The anagram is displayed below the crossword, and players must swipe across the letters to form words.

The game features over 6,000 crossword puzzles for players to solve. More points can be unlocked by finding hidden words, and each level also comes with a beautiful landscape background. The game is available for free download on both the Google Play Store and the iOS App Store.

Wordscapes Daily Puzzle Clues (Feb. 23)

Here are hints for all the Wordscapes Daily Puzzle answers for February 23, 2026, to make your puzzle a bit easier.

Across

  1. Greatest in number or amount.
  2. To rest on a chair.
  3. A bed for a baby.
  4. A genre of video games, for example, Flight – _ _ _.
  5. Formation of a cloud through very small drops of water.
  6. Suffers without complaining.

Down

  1. Something that is slightly wet/damp.
  2. A comedy series with characters in different amusing situations each week.
  3. The price of something.
  4. Another way to write “it is”.
  5. To leave something out.
  6. Belonging to a thing.
  7. A sudden, quick movement in the muscle.

All Wordscapes Daily Puzzle Answers (Feb. 23)

Here are all the answers for Wordscapes Daily Puzzle on February 23, 2026, if the hints were not enough for you.

Across 

  1. MOST
  2. SIT
  3. COT
  4. SIM
  5. MIST
  6. STOIC

Down

  1. MOIST
  2. SITCOM
  3. COST
  4. TIS
  5. OMIT
  6. ITS
  7. TIC

When is the Next Wordscapes Daily Puzzle?

The next daily puzzle will be updated at 12 AM local time, with the next, for February 24, arriving tomorrow.

What are your thoughts on today’s Wordscapes Daily Puzzle? Did you find it difficult or easy? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more word games, check out hints and answers for today’s Quordle #1491, and take a look at hints for today’s NYT Mini Crossword.

item.title: Today’s Quordle #1491: All Answers & Hints For February 23, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Quordle takes the complexity of the original daily word game and ups the ante by having you solve four solutions at once. Your 100% attention suddenly needs to be diverted four ways, and completing the daily Quordle is tough without the right starting words or hints. February 23, 2026, Quordle is the #1491 edition of the puzzle, and there are four new words for you to find. This guide has hints and a helping hand to help you solve all four words.

Before the information comes thick and fast at you, make sure you give today’s Quordle a go if you haven’t already!

How To Play Quordle Daily Word Game

Quordle is different from other daily word games as it requires you to correctly work out four words at once, and you can attempt this through the official Quordle website.

Before anything else, check out this set of instructions on finding and playing Quordle:

  1. Go to the Quordle website.
  2. You should be presented with four equal boxes reminiscent of a Wordle setup.
  3. Enter your first guess using the keyboard input at the bottom of the screen.
  4. The game will fill out the first of nine lines for all four boxes.
  5. A green box means the letter is correct AND goes in that exact spot on the grid.
  6. A yellow box means the letter is correct BUT needs to go in a different spot on the grid.
  7. A grey box means the letter DOESN’T feature at all.
  8. Do this up to nine times to try to solve all four words.

Best Quordle Tips & Tricks

  • Try to use as many of the five vowels as you can in your first two guesses.
  • Focus on solving words with more green and yellow boxes first.
  • Avoid reusing letters that are not applicable across any of the four answers.
  • Don’t be afraid to try the same letter twice in one word, as answers can be sneaky like that.
  • Play the Practice game first if you’re not used to Quordle, or need a warm-up before today’s new game!

Quordle Hints For Today, February 23, 2026

Top-left grid

  • Hint 1: To move in a stealthy or slow and animated way.
  • Hint 2: Add a “y” for a fun toy!

Top-right grid

  • Hint 1: “Any of a genus (Rhus) of trees, shrubs, and woody vines of the cashew family that have leaves turning to brilliant colors in the autumn.”
  • Hint 2: Dried powdered leaves

Bottom-left grid

  • Hint 1: To venture into somewhere.
  • Hint 2: Attempting something new.

Bottom-right grid

  • Hint 1: Edible crustacean.
  • Hint 2: Could go well with a ‘cocktail’ or ‘crackers.’

Starter Words For February 23, 2026 Quordle

You should consider using one or more of the following words to get you started with today’s new Quordle puzzle:

  • Wrang
  • Slack
  • Fluke

SPOILER WARNING: The answers will be revealed next!

All Today’s Quordle #1491 Answers For February 23, 2026

Get ready for all four of today’s Quordle answers, starting from the top-left grid, then the top-right, then the bottom-left, and finally the bottom-right.

When Is The Next Quordle Daily Game?

Quordle is updated daily at 12 AM (Midnight) in your time zone and region, so the next game will start on February 24

The Quordle schedule is very consistent and always comes out at the same time each new day.

What Is Quordle?

Quordle is a variation of the popular Wordle daily word game, but instead of giving you one word to solve, you must figure out four unique words at the same time.

Needless to say, Quordle is MUCH harder than Wordle! There are days when it might be an achievement just to solve one of the four words. Whereas you can guess Wordle with your first answer, that’s impossible with Quordle. You need to be thinking on all cylinders with Quordle, and Insider Gaming strongly recommends you take the hints above on board and apply them to future Quordle puzzles.

Additionally, a new daily guide will be on the website for every new puzzle. Keep coming back each day for hints and solutions to the newest Quordle daily word games!

How did you find today’s Quordle? If you have any feedback on what you want to see added to these guides, share your thoughts via the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

You should also check out IG’s other word game guides:

  • NYT Mini Crossword Hints Today—Answers For Monday, February 23
  • Today’s Contexto #1254: Hints & Answer For February 23, 2026
  • NYT Connections Hints Today (#988)—Answers for Monday, February 23
  • Today’s Strands #721 Hints and Answers for February 22, 2026
